PAD_Prayer.synopsis: Shadowheart prays to Shar. Part of her recurring behaviour in camp at night.

PAD_Greeting.synopsis: Players can sit down on a stool in Shadowheart's camp corner. If Shadowheart is present and a companion, she will offer a short response pending on her relationship status.

PAD_CallPet.synopsis: Shadowheart tries to call one of the camp pets over. Part of some behaviours Shadowheart's softer side, that kick in as the story progresses to hint that she may be swayed from Shar/be denying her true natue.

CRD_WildMagic.synopsis: At camp, Shadowheart experiences a brief flare-up of mysterious magical energy, She reacts with alarm an utters the name of Shar, her patron goddess. If other party members are present, they ask her what just happened.
CRD_WildMagic.how_to_trigger: Bypass the scene trigger for FOR_Village_OM_ShadowHeart_COM, then go to camp after having reached the goblin camp. CFM will be added to the camp night queue (may not trigger immediately)

PAD_Prayer_2.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Prayer_2.text: Praise be to Lady Shar. As the sun retreats once again, all becomes your realm.
PAD_Prayer_2.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day.

PAD_Prayer_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Prayer_1.text: Let the pains of the day be forgotten, soothed by your embrace.
PAD_Prayer_1.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day.

PAD_Prayer_8.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Prayer_8.text: May a time come when the sun never rises again, and your darkness reaches eternity.
PAD_Prayer_8.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day.

PAD_Prayer_5.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Prayer_5.text: Mistress of the Night, guide my hand, my step, my mind, and my blade.
PAD_Prayer_5.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day.

PAD_Prayer_7.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Prayer_7.text: Let me follow in your path. Let me become one with your umbral splendour.
PAD_Prayer_7.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day.

PAD_Prayer_3.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Prayer_3.text: Guide me where others fear to tread. Guide me to your embrace.
PAD_Prayer_3.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day.

PAD_Prayer_6.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Prayer_6.text: Lend me your strength, my Lady of Loss, for the battles yet to come.
PAD_Prayer_6.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day. A little more martial here.

PAD_Prayer_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Prayer_0.text: May the lives of your enemies be snuffed out like guttering candles.
PAD_Prayer_0.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day. A little more martial here.

PAD_Prayer_10.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Prayer_10.text: Let the earth feast on the blood of the faithless, until only those who seek the embrace remain.
PAD_Prayer_10.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day. A little more martial here.

PAD_Prayer_11.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Prayer_11.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day. A little more contrite/confessional here

PAD_Prayer_4.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Prayer_4.text: I have ventured far from shadows. I have shared words with unbelievers. I have followed your teachings imperfectly.
PAD_Prayer_4.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day. A little more contrite/confessional here

PAD_Prayer_9.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Prayer_9.text: Grant me the time and guidance I need to become your vessel, my lady.
PAD_Prayer_9.context: NodeContext: Praying to Shar in camp at the end of the day. A little more contrite/confessional here

PAD_Greeting_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Greeting_0.text: Aren't you a sight for sore eyes?
PAD_Greeting_0.context: NodeContext: Playful. Addressed to romantic partner player, who has just sat down in her corner  of the camp

PAD_Greeting_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Greeting_1.text: There's plenty of space at camp - no need to crowd me.
PAD_Greeting_1.context: NodeContext: Some disdain. A player she dislikes has decided to sit close by in her corner of their camp.

PAD_Greeting_2.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Greeting_2.text: You grace my stool? I'm honoured.
PAD_Greeting_2.context: NodeContext: Welcoming. A player SH likes/respects has sat down in her corner of the camp

PAD_Greeting_3.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Greeting_3.text: People will start talking, with all the time we spend together...

PAD_Greeting_4.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Greeting_4.text: You should come over more often.
PAD_Greeting_4.context: NodeContext: Welcoming. A player SH likes/respects has sat down in her corner of the camp

PAD_Greeting_5.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Greeting_5.text: I was hoping you'd come by.

PAD_Greeting_6.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Greeting_6.context: NodeContext: Warm. Addressed to romantic partner player, who has just sat down in her corner  of the camp

PAD_Greeting_7.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Greeting_7.text: Yes, you sit right there and let me drink in the sight of you.
PAD_Greeting_7.context: NodeContext: Playful. Addressed to romantic partner player, who has just sat down in her corner  of the camp

PAD_Greeting_8.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Greeting_8.context: NodeContext: Commenting on the player sitting on a stool in her corner of the camp (neutral/undefined relationship status)

PAD_Greeting_9.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Greeting_9.text: I'm glad you decided to join me.
PAD_Greeting_9.context: NodeContext: Welcoming. A player SH likes/respects has sat down in her corner of the camp

PAD_Greeting_12.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Greeting_12.text: I do enjoy our little sits together.
PAD_Greeting_12.context: NodeContext: Sincere. Addressed to romantic partner player, who has just sat down in her corner  of the camp

PAD_Greeting_13.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_Greeting_13.text: Take the weight off. You've earned it.
PAD_Greeting_13.context: NodeContext: Welcoming. A player SH likes/respects has sat down in her corner of the camp

PAD_CallPet_0.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_CallPet_0.text: What do you get up to all day without us, hmm?
PAD_CallPet_0.context: NodeContext: Beckoning over Scratch, the camp dog.

PAD_CallPet_1.speaker: Shadowheart
PAD_CallPet_1.text: Now, play nice... claws and beak to yourself, please...
PAD_CallPet_1.context: NodeContext: Beckoning over the camp's owlbear cub (wild/potentially dangerous when fully grown, but cute for now)

CRD_WildMagic_11.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_11.text: Something's wrong. I feel... I feel...

CRD_WildMagic_91.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_91.text: Ngh, it hurts... Darkness protect me...
CRD_WildMagic_91.context: CinematicNodeContext: Shadowheart reacts to the pain of the incurable wound in her right hand. She raises the hand and grimaces in pain. After a brief moment the pain passes and she lowers her hand, face relaxing, returning to default pose.

CRD_WildMagic_81.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_81.context: NodeContext: A little shaken, but trying to brush it off.

CRD_WildMagic_29.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_29.text: Don't worry. Whatever it is, we're in this together.

CRD_WildMagic_67.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_67.text: I... thank you. But I'm sure it was nothing. I just... need a little space.
CRD_WildMagic_67.context: InternalNodeContext: Approval upNodeContext: Tiny bit of gratitude while still trying to dismiss the topic.

CRD_WildMagic_73.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_73.text: Pull yourself together. We've all got fears to wrestle with.

CRD_WildMagic_5.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_5.text: I know that. I had just hoped you might show some more understanding. Leave me alone, please.
CRD_WildMagic_5.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player greater than 10NodeContext: A little wounded by the player's brusque 'pull yourself together' advice

CRD_WildMagic_21.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_21.text: I don't need your tough love. I need to be left alone. Now.
CRD_WildMagic_21.context: InternalNodeContext: Approval downNodeContext: Cold anger.

CRD_WildMagic_64.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_64.text: Not some sort of Sharran magic...?

CRD_WildMagic_12.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_12.text: No... or at least, I don't think so. Perhaps Lady Shar is testing me somehow. But if she is, then I have no idea what her purpose is.
CRD_WildMagic_12.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player greater than 10NodeContext: Troubled speculation. She doesn't understand the strange magic afflicting her.

CRD_WildMagic_78.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_78.text: I said I don't know. Forget it.

CRD_WildMagic_83.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_83.text: Could it be her tadpole? Ask how she feels.

CRD_WildMagic_31.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_31.text: I'm fine. It's passed, whatever it was...

CRD_WildMagic_28.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_28.text: ...and stop looking at me like that. I'm not sprouting tentacles just yet.

CRD_WildMagic_38.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_38.text: Use your shared connection. Enter her thoughts.

CRD_WildMagic_36.speaker: Narrator
CRD_WildMagic_36.text: *Uncertainty. Shadowheart is wrestling with what this pain means. Perhaps it is connected to Shar, she wonders, or perhaps not...*

CRD_WildMagic_20.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_20.text: 'Darkness protect me'? What did you mean by that?

CRD_WildMagic_26.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_26.text: I... it's difficult for me to talk about. I'm sorry.
CRD_WildMagic_26.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player is greater than 10

CRD_WildMagic_10.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_10.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player is greater than zero, less than ten

CRD_WildMagic_43.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_43.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player is less than zero

CRD_WildMagic_6.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_6.text: You're a Shar worshipper, aren't you?

CRD_WildMagic_58.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_58.text: ...I should have been more discreet around you, clearly. Yes, you're right.

CRD_WildMagic_19.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_19.text: Don't be sorry - just tell me what you're hiding.

CRD_WildMagic_48.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_48.text: You're not going to let this go, are you?

CRD_WildMagic_46.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_46.text: I worship Shar, the Mistress of the Night.

CRD_WildMagic_16.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_16.text: Don't make a fuss, Selûnite - we may be at odds, but I have more important concerns than you right now.

CRD_WildMagic_65.speaker: Lae'zel
CRD_WildMagic_65.text: The goddess of secrets? How telling.

CRD_WildMagic_39.speaker: Karlach
CRD_WildMagic_39.text: Fantastic. Monsters in our minds, and around our campfire.
CRD_WildMagic_39.context: NodeContext: muttering angrily - just found out one of her companions worships an evil goddess

CRD_WildMagic_80.speaker: Astarion
CRD_WildMagic_80.text: Heavens forbid. We're all entitled to our secrets.

CRD_WildMagic_85.speaker: Wyll
CRD_WildMagic_85.text: A Shar worshipper? Not my usual quarry - nor my usual ally.

CRD_WildMagic_30.speaker: Gale
CRD_WildMagic_30.text: You worship Shar? Blimey. She and my beloved Mystra are not exactly friends.

CRD_WildMagic_79.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_79.text: I'll decide whether to make a fuss or not. Hard to trust someone who's holding out on me.

CRD_WildMagic_69.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_69.text: Don't make a big fuss...? You've been lying to me!

CRD_WildMagic_33.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_33.text: A lie of omission at most. I'm sure you have some skeletons of your own hidden away.

CRD_WildMagic_89.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_89.text: Secrecy is everything for Shar's children. It's our code, our creed, our shield.

CRD_WildMagic_44.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_44.text: I'm not sorry I kept this from you. Not one bit.

CRD_WildMagic_45.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_45.text: Though perhaps that might change, if you can show an open mind.
CRD_WildMagic_45.context: NodeContext: Conceding jus a little towards the player's hurt feelings - but conditionally

CRD_WildMagic_13.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_13.text: Let's see how open-minded I can be then: tell me more.

CRD_WildMagic_24.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_24.text: Talk to me later. The day's been long enough already.

CRD_WildMagic_59.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_59.text: I don't know how I feel about this.

CRD_WildMagic_0.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_0.text: Who says you have to feel anything?

CRD_WildMagic_27.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_27.text: Gather your thoughts. Then, perhaps, we can talk some more.

CRD_WildMagic_34.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_34.text: We can discuss this later. But let's just try a little more honesty going forward.

CRD_WildMagic_87.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_87.text: All we can do is try, I suppose...

CRD_WildMagic_90.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_90.text: Thank you for telling me, at least.

CRD_WildMagic_2.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_2.text: Don't thank me - I'm breaking Lady Shar's teachings just by doing so... but sometimes you have to be practical.
CRD_WildMagic_2.context: NodeContext: A little embarassed at being thanked

CRD_WildMagic_8.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_8.text: I can't trust you. Best if we travel separately for now.

CRD_WildMagic_77.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_77.text: If you insist. Don't expect to fare well without me to save you.

CRD_WildMagic_86.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_86.text: It's been some time since I met another faithful of Shar. Are you versed in her teachings?

CRD_WildMagic_55.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_55.text: Of course I am. But we can talk about this later - I want to enjoy the still of the night.

CRD_WildMagic_57.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_57.text: You could have told me. How long were you going to keep this secret?

CRD_WildMagic_49.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_49.text: Forever, ideally. And you assume too much about what I can and cannot tell.

CRD_WildMagic_7.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_7.text: I didn't agree to join up with a Shar worshipper.

CRD_WildMagic_62.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_62.text: Then it's your own fault for not asking.

CRD_WildMagic_35.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_35.text: Now that the truth's out, tell me more.

CRD_WildMagic_22.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_22.text: In future, I expect you to be honest. Let's leave it at that for now.

CRD_WildMagic_52.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_52.text: I don't care who you worship. We have bigger problems.

CRD_WildMagic_25.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_25.text: True. I didn't think you'd react so pragmatically. Perhaps I should have told you sooner.

CRD_WildMagic_76.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_76.text: Shar is an abomination. You deceived me.

CRD_WildMagic_53.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_53.text: Your blindness as much as my deception, Selûnite. We can talk about this later - if you're willing.

CRD_WildMagic_82.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_82.text: I bow to Shar also. The Dark Lady must favour us, to have brought us together.

CRD_WildMagic_15.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_15.text: I... yes, she must. I'll offer thanks to her in my prayers - and we should speak more later. Alone, ideally.

CRD_WildMagic_54.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_54.text: Now that you have the truth, please don't make a big fuss about it.

CRD_WildMagic_47.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_47.text: Please, it's nothing. Just let it rest.
CRD_WildMagic_47.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player is greater than zero

CRD_WildMagic_18.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_18.text: It's nothing. Even if it was something, I'm clearly not going to tell you, am I? Let it go.
CRD_WildMagic_18.context: InternalNodeContext: SH approval of player is less than zero

CRD_WildMagic_88.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_88.text: There's more to this. What aren't you telling me?

CRD_WildMagic_41.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_41.text: Use your shared connection. Enter her thoughts.

CRD_WildMagic_74.speaker: Narrator
CRD_WildMagic_74.text: *You sense her trying to understand what just happened. She silently begs her goddess for guidance - Shar.*

CRD_WildMagic_75.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_75.text: Stop! If I want to tell you something, I'll use my mouth - understand?

CRD_WildMagic_4.speaker: Shadowheart
CRD_WildMagic_4.text: Fumble in my head again and I'll gut you.

CRD_WildMagic_56.speaker: Player
CRD_WildMagic_56.text: Turn a blind eye and leave.
